name: Rockman: Complete Works
overview: Relive all the classic adventures of the Blue Bomber with Capcom's new Rockman Complete Works series! All 6 NES/Famicom games have been reworked and brought to the PlayStation, with all the classic enemies, bosses, weapons, and of course, the evil Dr. Wily! In Rockman, Dr. Wily has reprogrammed six of Dr. Light's helper robots and wants to take over the world. Only Rock, Dr. Light's best assistant, wasn't reprogrammed, and decides to battle Dr. Wily and stop his evil plan. So Dr. Light gives him an upgrade to turn him into a fighter robot. Thus, Rockman was born! Now you must help Rockman get through Dr. Wily's army of robots and stop his plans before it's too late! The Rockman Complete Works series was only released in Japan.
